properties.title: Content
properties.name: content
properties.info: Text for inside heading.

properties.title: Color
properties.name: color
properties.info: Color of heading text.

properties.title: Font Size
properties.name: fontSize
properties.info: Size of heading text in pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Padding
properties.name: padding
properties.info: Internal space around text in pixels, em, or rem. Goes in order of top, right, bottom, left or top and bottom, left and right.

properties.title: Margin
properties.name: margin
properties.info: External space around text in pixels, ems, or rems. Goes in order of top, right, bottom, left or top and bottom, left and right.

properties.title: Text Align
properties.name: textAlign
properties.info: Aligns text left, right, or center

properties.title: Heading
properties.name: heading
properties.info: Semantic heading size for accesibility.

properties.title: Font Weight
properties.name: fontWeight
properties.info: Adjusts the thickness of the characters

properties.title: Width
properties.name: width
properties.info: Width of heading text in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Height
properties.name: height
properties.info: Height of heading text in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Line Height
properties.name: lineHeight
properties.info: Line height of heading text in pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Source
properties.name: source
properties.info: Source for image to load.

properties.title: Alternate Text
properties.name: alt
properties.info: Alternate text for image for accessibility

properties.title: Padding
properties.name: padding
properties.info: Internal space around image container in pixels, em, or rem. Goes in order of top, right, bottom, left or top and bottom, left and right.

properties.title: Margin
properties.name: margin
properties.info: External space around image text. Goes in order of top, right, bottom, left or top and bottom, left and right.

properties.title: Width
properties.name: width
properties.info: Width of image container in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Height
properties.name: height
properties.info: Height of heading text in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Image Width
properties.name: width
properties.info: Width of image in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Image Height
properties.name: imgHeight
properties.info: Height of image in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.
